<title level="1" right="Rules">[Background](/Rules.aspx?ID=3290)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 10 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
A background represents what a character experienced before they took up the life of an adventurer. Each background grants a feat and training in one or more skills. You can read more about backgrounds in [Chapter 2](/Rules.aspx?ID=2094).
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
